title: rl/hifiampliconanalysis pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq.errorMessage: FastQ file for HiFi reads must be provided or a fasta file with custom sequences that will go staight to the ALIGN_CLUSTERS module, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz', '.fastq.gz', '.fasta', or '.fa'

fasta.errorMessage: Fasta file for reference fasta cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fasta' or '.fa'

primer1.errorMessage: Nucleotide sequence of the forward primer- can be any combination of capitalized or lowercase letters, degenerate sequences are not currently supported

primer2.errorMessage: Nucleotide sequence of the reverse primer- can be any combination of capitalized or lowercase letters, degenerate sequences are not currently supported
